Skokie.Evanston Wilmette Community Golf Course: The Evanston Wilmette Community Golf Course, formerly known as the Peter N. Jans Memorial Golf Course and locally called the Canal Shores Golf Course, is an 18-hole, par 60 golf course located in a suburban residential neighborhood on the east side of Evanston and Wilmette, Illinois. Founded in 1919 on the banks of the North Shore Channel of the Chicago River, the course is 3,904 yards in length, featuring a narrow and tree-lined fairway and two over-the-water holes. Eleven of the holes are located in Evanston, Illinois and 7 holes are in Wilmette, Illinois.
